participant_1.name: Larry
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Larry has a zest for life and loves to explore both in the kitchen and on the water. He carries a playful spirit and enjoys engaging conversations.
participant_1.background: Hey my name is larry and i'm a chef. if i am not cooking in the kitchen then i am definitely on the water. l also love comic books. spiderman is my favorite.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: An energetic and creative individual, Emily is passionate about her profession and enjoys reading. Despite being an athlete, she has a soft spot for stories and characters in comic books.
participant_2.background: I am married to a doctor. my family is continuously growing. i am a professional tennis player. i live in a three storey house.
